SEARCH
Package dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.config

Class ConfigManager

java.lang.Object
dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.config.ConfigManager
public class ConfigManager extends Object
Platform-agnostic configuration manager using annotation-driven mapping and Jackson (YAML/JSON/JSONC/TOML).

    Creates a new ConfigManager for the provided platform.

      Parameters:

    • loadConfigFile

      public <T> T loadConfigFile(Class<T> configClass, String... placeholders)
      Registers and loads a configuration class using placeholder pairs. Accepts key, value, key, value... and converts them to a map.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of configuration
      Parameters:
      configClass - the configuration class
      placeholders - key/value pairs for placeholders
      Returns:
      loaded configuration instance

      Parameters:
      configClass - config type to fetch
      Returns:
      primary instance or null if none registered

      configClass - config type to reload

    • reload

      public <T> void reload(Class<T> configClass, String... sections)
      Reloads registered instances of a config class, optionally scoping to specific sections.
      Type Parameters:
      T - config type
      Parameters:
      configClass - config type to reload
      sections - sections to reload (empty for full reload)

    • onChange

      public <T> void onChange(Class<T> configClass, BiConsumer<T,Set<String>> listener)
      Registers a listener that fires when the config changes on disk.
      Type Parameters:
      T - config type
      Parameters:
      configClass - config type to monitor
      listener - callback receiving updated instance and changed sections

      public void shutdown()
      Stops the watcher service and releases associated resources.
